## Brain stroke prediction dataset

Fuente: <https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/zzettrkalpakbal/full-filled-brain-stroke-dataset>.

Tama√±o:
Filas: 5110
Columnas: 12


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dslabs)
library(readr)
data_acv <- read.csv("healthcare-dataset-stroke-data.csv")
head(data_acv)
```
```{r}
str(data_acv)
summary(data_acv)
```

```{r}
data_acv2<-data_acv %>%
  filter(work_type != 'children')

data_acv3<-data_acv2 %>%
  filter(.data, age)
```



```{r}
numeric_val=data_acv2[, sapply(data_acv2, is.numeric)]

cor_matrix = cor(numeric_val); cor_matrix

library(corrplot)
corrplot(cor_matrix, method = "number", tl.col = "black")

```
